main event: A bright, oval-shaped object was sighted in Archbold, Ohio on September 5, 1957, moving very fast and exhibiting unusual flight behavior.
interesting points: The object was initially thought to be an aircraft in trouble due to its fast horizontal movement and climb, but its speed and manner of flight indicated otherwise.
The object was described as shining like the reflection of a mirror.
The witness reported the object as a metallic disc-like shape with a glow of light emanating from its underside.
The report was forwarded to the Air Defense Command and considered to have insufficient data for proper evaluation.
No photographs were taken of the object, and the witness stated that nobody else viewed the flying saucer at that time.
sighted object: bright, oval-shaped object exhibiting unusual flight behavior
